snippet: Justice Minister Christiane Taubira, who is from French Guiana, is an outspoken woman of color in a position of considerable visibility and influence, in a country where few have come before her.

lead_paragraph: Justice Minister Christiane Taubira, who is from French Guiana, is an outspoken woman of color in a position of considerable visibility and influence, in a country where few have come before her.

headline.main: Ascending Heights of French Power, Trailed by Her ‘Otherness’
